name: Gravity Jar
description:
★ STORY ★
In Gravity Jar you must help Norman, a cute alien, to get back home after he accidentally beamed himself in a galaxy far away. With the help of his gravity jar (hence the name), he can convert specific elements full of mysterious liquid gravity energy into the energy he needs to get back home.

★ ABOUT THE GAME ★
The gameplay is simple, when you recognize 2 or more identical elements next to each other you must tap on them to release the liquid gravity energy. The faster you tap the better, since the liquid in the elements has a short half-time.

Gravity Jar is a fun, match 3 puzzle space themed game for children and adults alike. Though the gameplay is simple, it will get really challenging and mind bending as levels will get bigger and more and more elements with different effects will appear.
Choose you tactics well to reach the next level in this puzzle challenge and help Norman to return home!

★KEY FEATURES★
◆ Simple Gameplay. Each level displays a certain number of mixed elements filled with liquid gravity energy. Your goal is to find any 2-or-more elements of the same kind and tap on them.
◆ 100+ levels. In total Gravity Jar has 24 levels each with up to 5 sections with puzzles that you must advance through. Levels get tougher and there's a certain score threshold that must be passed.
◆ Gyroscope detection. You can change gravity in the jar and have the elements re-arrange by rotating your device as Gravity Jar uses the gyroscope sensor to detect changes.
◆ Multiple elements with diffent features and play tactics
◆ Eye candy graphics with fluid and bubbles
◆ Achievements & Leaderboard. You can connect your Google Play Services account to access 20 different types of achievements and see how well you compare with your friends in the leaderboards.

At Windows and Linux you can change gravity with your cursor keys!
At Android you can change gravity by turning your device!
